Custom Accordion (Web Component)

VWO is a leading A/B testing and conversion optimization platform. Shadow DOM is a web standard that encapsulates DOM and CSS in a component. Web Components are a set of web platform APIs for creating reusable custom elements.

Shadow DOM

Open Shadow Root

The element below has an open shadow root. Its internals are accessible via element.shadowRoot.

Closed Shadow Root

The element below has a closed shadow root. Its internals are NOT accessible via element.shadowRoot.

Shadow DOM with Form

A complete form rendered inside a shadow root.

Nested Shadow DOM

Shadow DOM nested inside another shadow DOM.
